## Point.uintField() method

Adds an unsigned integer field.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
uintField(name: string, value: number | any): Point;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  name | string | field name |
|  value | number \| any | field value |

<b>Returns:</b>

[Point](./influxdb-client.point.md)

this

## Exceptions

NaN out of range value is supplied
